segments.text: That's a lot of money ! What did you do ? Break the piggy bank ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I'm gonna go to the bank and change it for bills , but first I have to separate them into little piles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I'll find all the quarters and dimes while you sort the nickels and pennies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great , then we can add everything up and take it to the bank .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I found some coins that are not from here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh yeah , those are from my trip to London . I have a couple of different pence , but in all it won't add up to one pound .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure the bank will change these coins for you ?
segments.speaker: S2
